document.full_text: euro zone governments are considering a plan to prevent a greek default under which private investors would be asked to maintain their exposure to its debt and athens would receive a new package of eu/imf aid, euro zone sources said.
document.title: eurozone eyes new deal for greece; ecb issues threat
lines_and_colors: euro zone governments are considering a plan to prevent a greek default under which private investors would be asked to maintain their exposure to its debt and athens would receive a new package of eu/imf aid, euro zone sources said.
